name: Aegis (itch) (kekis)
description:
Using a flying indestructible robot, your objective is to protect innocent people, who are stuck to each other with rope.

The game is controlled by mouse only.

- Credits -

kekis - Programming, Design

Iiro - Art assets

Hugo - Music and SFX

This game was developed in a 48 hour period for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

If there are any problems with the Web version of the game, consider using the Windows standalone version.
